channel.title: Harvey's First Proper Laugh/Giggle
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mm5LPh_Kazw
Hey all.
Today, Harvey had his first ever laughing/giggling fit. He's 3 months old now, can you believe it? (Harvey's my son for those of you that don't know).

item.title: Harvey's First Proper Laugh/Giggle
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:24, topic:387745”][quote author=Newty link=topic=483540.msg3543696#msg3543696 date=1301027763]
Very cute laugh.

PS: You just might be the first person on Moparscape that has a kid.
[/quote]
Well, I can say that 3 years ago I almost beat em lol. (Woulda been 16 at the time ), my gf (at the time) wanted to have a child so that I would not be able to move to finish schooling. Took me 2 months of convincing her and try to not do anything sexual in any matter.

@Mendorphins - Actually, you might be the first, as anybody here that is “mature” has too much other things to do than have a love life (god i fall in this :(, FUCK WORK).[/quote]
Hai, what makes you think I fall in the mature category? I might not be a complete prick but I ain’t no moderator material, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Harvey's First Proper Laugh/Giggle
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:12, topic:387745”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=483540.msg3542370#msg3542370 date=1300947941]

Awww hes so cute (: I can’t wait to have kids, it may be hard to go threw all the stress but there so worth it.

It’s even MORE cute when you know it’s your own creation making those noises. It’s beautiful. :wub: :manup:

I know what you mean, my and my girlfriend thought we were pregnant two months ago and all I could do was day dream about how it would be a little creation from us. Goodluck with your son mate, your pretty lucky (:

If you’re young and decide to/end up having a baby with your girlfriend, your life’s not over. Infact it’s just begun. There’s never a right or wrong age to have kids, and being a parent at any age always has its pros and cons.

If you think that it’s all shitty nappies and screaming babies, it’s not. Giving him/her their first bath and seeing how they react to the water, seeing there first smile, hearing there first sound, watching them dream, seeing them looking at you knowing they know they feel safe with you are only just a minute amount of things to look forward to.

It all depends on what you make of the situation.

Wish you the best, mate, in whatever you decide on doing.
[/quote]
Thank you (: your son is very cute btw.[/quote]
Hehe, I know. :):)

Read full topic

If you think that it’s all shitty nappies and screaming babies, it’s not. Giving him/her their first bath and seeing how they react to the water, seeing there first smile, hearing there first sound, watching them dream, seeing them looking at you knowing they know they feel safe with you are only just a minute amount of things to look forward to.

item.title: Harvey's First Proper Laugh/Giggle
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins

@Mendorphins wrote:

LOL yeah we use Bonjela teething gel nowadays. Seems to work, tastes nice too.

Read full topic

item.title: Harvey's First Proper Laugh/Giggle
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Haha, yea, teething is hell, I used to breed dogs, and WOW was that a nightmare when puppies started getting their adult teeth. I know, as such a young child, it actually can hurt at points. Mom’s friend down here has a son named Jessie, 4 years old, but I remember he would bust out crying all of a sudden. His G’Ma would get out a bit of whiskey and rub it on his gums (god i would love to see what CPS would say about that)

Read full topic

item.title: Harvey's First Proper Laugh/Giggle
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

His mouth suddenly started drooling like nothing you’ve ever seen about a month ago, and does still now… I think he has a slight show but not properly broken through yet. It’s definitely happening very soon though as he stares at his fist for a while then… NOM NOM NOM… he chews it.

Read full topic

item.title: Harvey's First Proper Laugh/Giggle
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Lol, tbh I wasn’t paying attention to who all was laughing, was just glad to see he is nice and healthy. He getting any teeth yet? (not sure at what age this is)

EDIT - Just re-watched, and I could tell that was a fake laugh, just from the fact there are like 4 different ones from the same pitch.

Read full topic

item.title: Harvey's First Proper Laugh/Giggle
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

cheers Coon. Also please note, my stupid and rediculous laugh was to provoke him to laugh more, that is not how I really laugh - so don’t perceive me as retarded lool.

Read full topic
